summary: variants of various weapons for use by modders either as place holders, replacers, new items etc.
descriptionHtml:
Project: Weapon-Item Variants
Author: jsnider193
Version: 1.0 
Release Date: 2/18/2013
Category: Resources
Website(s): 


==================
Requirements:
==================

Skyrim 1.5.26.0.5 or greater

==================
Description:
==================

Contains meshes and textures for multiple different weapons at this stage.  This is a resource only and to use you will have to add into your game/mod.  If need help ask and will assist.


==================
Details:
==================

Contains the following meshes with textures ....  check the images for the look.

AXE:  A steel battleaxe and falmer axe variant.  Added a Battle and War Axe alternates. Added a different look for the RuefulAxe.
Blade Shields:  Five different looks for this item.
Blood Weapons:  Battle Axe/War Axe/Executioner Axe/Bow/Dagger/Sword/Great Sword/War Hammer/Soul Bow/Mace meshes.  All based on the glass weapons in the game and modified to have a reddish look to them.
Bow:  Ancient Bow (7), Daedric Bows (9), Elven (2), and Falmer (1) variants.
Dagger: 1 variant on the iron dagger.
Staff:  Staff01 (5), staff02 (3), staff03 (3), and staff04 (2) variants
Sword:  Blade Sword (1) and a Falmer Sword.


==================
Installation:
==================

A resource, the user will have to incorporate the wanted meshes and textures into their mod.

==================
Un-Installation:
==================

N/A

==================
Upgrading:
==================

Will add to over time as play with Nifscope and Gimp.  If want an esm/esp that adds these to the game ask and will provide as isn\'t that much extra to do.

==================
Incompatible:
==================

Should not be an issue.

==================
Changelog:
==================

6/26/2012 - Initial Release
7/05/2012 - Released two axes, battle and War.

==================
Contact Details:
==================

Just post in release or send me a PM


==================
Credits:
==================

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to InsanitySorrow for the ReadMe Generator this ReadMe is based on.

==================
Tools Used:
==================

ReadMe Generator
Creation Kit
GIMP
Paint.Net
Nifskope

==================
Licensing/Legal:
==================

You can do whatever you wish with this, just do not complain if something goes wrong.

Credit for my work would be appreciated.

==================
Modder\'s Will:
==================

If I am offline for six months or longer and do not respond to any attempts made at contacting me, then you are free to upload this project to another site(s) as long as I am credited as the original author.
author: jsnider193
